title: The Beetle sucks, All Praise the Beetle
description: On this episode we sit down with the director of "The Bug: Life and Times of the People's Car", Damon Ristau, to talk about the importance of the VW Beetle, why he made this movie, and why a terrible car is so important. Producer Tory Alonzo joins us as well.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: On this episode we sit down with the director of "The Bug: Life and Times of the People's Car", Damon Ristau, to talk about the importance of the VW Beetle, why he made this movie, and why a terrible car is so important. Producer Tory Alonzo joins us as well.
